remarks: Conditions for which ` A ` is a strictly monotone ordinal function. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Nov-2011.)
statement:
issmo.1 $e |- A : B --> On $.
issmo.2 $e |- Ord B $.
issmo.3 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( x e. y -> ( A ` x ) e. ( A ` y ) ) ) $.
issmo.4 $e |- dom A = B $.
issmo $p |- Smo A $.
$d A x y $.
